body:
The PR change to wrf as follows:

- Support Fujitsu compiler
- Add version 4.3.1 to 4.3.3
- output build log after build is ended
- fix external/io_netcdf
- Add WRF_HOME environment variable and PATH to prefix/{main,tools} when spack load wrf
- refactor to  change configure.defaults
title: wrf: Add New version, support fujitsu compiler, refactor and bug fix.
